nodes.text: Vullen Candroon was a male Pau'an gangster who was active during the Age of the Empire. Candroon was hired to work with Zefin Tuzo to track down Han Solo and Chewbacca after an incident on Lynos IV. Candroon lured the pair to a resort casino on Marquinn in an attempt to kill them. However, after a chase through the casino, Solo and Chewbacca were successfully able to evade Tuzo and Candroon's pursuit.
